name: Armored Battalion
description:
Armored battalion is a overlooking shooting game, which is different from the current tank battle mode. It is more inclined to the arcade.
There are two battle modes:
One is the battle mode. You can only use tanks that have fought in history.
One is RPG mode. You can choose chassis and artillery freely.
In order to restore the historical scene, he did a large-scale tank battle, which also made him have requirements for the performance of the machine.
In the future, we will continue to optimize performance and explore the possibility of larger-scale combat.
